text: Ndipo dziwani kuti pakati panu pali Mtumwi wa Mulungu ndipo iye akamachita zimene Al Hujurat	553 mufuna, ndithudi, inu mukadavutika kwambiri. Koma Mulungu wakusungitsani inu chipembedzo chake ndipo wachipanga icho kukhala chokongola mâ€™mitima mwanu, ndi kupanga kusakhulupirira kukhala chinthu choipa ndiponso kuswa malamulo ndi kusamvera. Awa ndiwo amene amatsatira njira yoyenera
